cast.name: 布鲁克·迪尔曼 Brooke Dillman

trans_title: 熊熊在哪里 第二季
introduction: From the creative team of Rick Copp (The Brady Bunch Movie), Joe Dietl (The Thin Pink Line), and Ben Zook (Jack and Jill) comes "Where the Bears Are" a comedy mystery web series that recently won Afterelton.com’s "BEST GAY WEB SERIES OF 2012" and has accumulated over 4 MILLION VIEWS since premiering last August. Season 2 follows the exploits of three gay bear roommates living together in Los Angeles, as they attempt to solve the murder of a close friend who turns up dead at his own political fundraiser.The season consists of 23, seven-minute episodes, and is a romp through L.A.’s trendy neighborhood of Silver Lake, eventually reaching its climax in the mountains of Big Bear.Featuring guest appearances by MARGARET CHO (Episode 4), BECKY THYRE ("Weeds") and CHRIS LAVOIE ("The Stephanie Miller Show") the series is designed to appeal to both gay and straight audiences alike, and Season 2 will premiere online June 10th.
chinese_title: 熊熊在哪里 第二季
